description: Delicis Del Platano is an initiative focused on producing innovative banana and plantain-based products, including snacks, sandwiches, and cocadas, with an emphasis on health and quality. The business aims to provide sugar-free alternatives that cater to health-conscious consumers, particularly those with diabetes. The products are made using natural ingredients, with a commitment to maintaining the essence of the fruit without the use of chemicals. The business operates with a focus on quality, sustainability, and community support, providing occasional work to local mothers in need.
name: Delicis Del Platano
